subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A trial in federal court will determine the fortunes of Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz. Several fans at the Mets’ spring training base said they were fed up with the team’s owners.
snippet: A trial in federal court will determine the fortunes of Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz. Several fans at the Mets’ spring training base said they were fed up with the team’s owners.
